general.noPermissionToViewPage: You don't have permission to view this page
general.oneFieldRequired: One of the two fields is mandatory
general.maxCharLimit: Exceeding the max character limit of {length}

general.invalidMimetype: The file format is unfortunately not supported
general.changeOrganizationHint: To change the organization please use the contact function
general.resetPasswordModalTitle: Do you really want to reset your password?
general.resetPasswordModalDescription: To reset your password, an email will be sent to the address you provided. You will then have 5 minutes to click on the link in the email and then set a new password. If you ignore the change request or the email cannot be received, your current password will be retained.
general.title: Title

history.PROPOSAL_REWORK: Application was passed back for rework to the researcher
history.PROPOSAL_CONTRACTING: Application has been released for contract conclusion
history.PROPOSAL_DATA_DELIVERY: Application has been enabled for data reception
history.PROPOSAL_DATA_CORRUPT: Data were objected to as being incorrect
history.PROPOSAL_DATA_RESEARCH: Data has been submitted and research has begun
history.PROPOSAL_READY_TO_ARCHIVE: Research project was released for archiving
history.DIZ_VOTE_ACCEPT: Research project was forwarded by DIZ
history.DIZ_VOTE_DECLINE: Research project was rejected by the DIZ
history.UAC_VOTE_ACCEPT: Research project was approved by the UAC
history.UAC_VOTE_CONDITIONAL_ACCEPT: Research project approved by UAC under conditions
history.UAC_VOTE_DECLINE: Research project was rejected by the UAC
history.CONTRACT_RESEARCHER_APPROVED: Researcher has agreed to the contract
history.CONTRACT_LOCATION_APPROVED: UAC has agreed to the contract
history.CONTRACT_SYSTEM_REJECTED: Location was excluded by the portal
history.PROPOSAL_LOCK_TRUE: Research project was locked by FDPG
history.PROPOSAL_LOCK_FALSE: Research project was unlocked by FDPG

dashboard.noRole: We are sorry. Currently you do not have an assigned role and cannot use the portal yet. After your registration, a manual activation step takes place. You will be informed when this has taken place. Depending on the volume, this may take 1-2 days.

proposal.mIIUsageApplicationForm: MII usage application form and study protocol
proposal.projectAbbreviationInfo: The acronym is used for communication purposes. It has to be unique und no longer than 15 characters: alphanumeric, special characters &/\\?.:#*+-_{'|'}{'@'}.
proposal.projectResponsibleInfo: Corresponds to the role responsible staff member in the contract documents, often project management
proposal.applicantIsProjectResponsible: Applicant is responsible for the project
proposal.projectUserInfo: The user signs the contract. It can be a person or an institution.
proposal.profileCompletionHint: As an applicant, you must have a complete profile to submit an application. {link}
proposal.profileCompletionHintLink: You can view and edit your profile here
proposal.participatingScientistsInfo: Involved scientists are persons contributing to the project (e.g. PI and Co-PIs, employees of the proposing organization, external third parties and laboratories, independent scientists). You should include at least scientists with direct access to data and bio samples. You may keep the list short, e.g. in context of large research initiatives.
proposal.name: Name
proposal.fullCorrectNameOfTheInstitutionFacilityJ: Full/correct name of the institution/facility/jur. person
proposal.involvedCategoryInfo: Information about the participant categories could be found here: https://forschen-fuer-gesundheit.de/menu_data.php
proposal.projectTitleInfo: The long project title serves for the identification of the project. Moreover it can be found by patiens while searching the project register. For the representation on the webpage the portal might assign an addition short title to each project.
proposal.projectDurationInfo: Please enter the number of months of the project duration and your preferred start date (without obligation). The project duration is important for the contract and data protection issues.
proposal.pleaseEnterTheNumberOfMonths: Please enter the number of months
proposal.pleaseEnterTheProjectFunding: Please enter the funding of the project
proposal.pleaseEnterTheFundingReferenceNumber: Please enter the funding reference number
proposal.statementsAssessmentOfFeasibilityInfo: Please reference the feasiblity analysis results belonging to your proposed project.
proposal.referToFeasibilityStudiesOrSimilarThatHa: Refer to feasibility studies or similar that have already been carried out
proposal.assessmentOfFeasibilityDetails: Additional information or reference to other feasibility studies
proposal.pleaseEnterAssessmentOfFeasibilityDetail: Please enter additional information about the feasibility studies that have been carried out
proposal.info: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt
proposal.egAccordingToOrFromAbstract: e.g. according to or from abstract
proposal.notRequired: declaration of non-responsibility from the ethics committee is attached
proposal.pleaseAttachProofOfTheEthicsVoteToTheApp: Please attach proof of the ethics vote to the application
proposal.areSufficientProfessionalAndFinancialRes: Are sufficient professional and financial resources available
Can you assure to have sufficient professional and financial ressources for the execution of the project?
proposal.expenseAllowancesHint: Please note that the payment of expense allowances for the provision and analysis of patient data and biomaterial must be guaranteed at the latest when the contract is concluded using available funds.
proposal.additionalDataCollection: During the project, the patients will be contacted again for additional data collection by the data providers.
proposal.intellectualPropertyRightCreationApplica: Please mention possible registrations of patents or trademarks.
proposal.pleaseNameYourIntellectualPropertyRights: Please name your intellectual property rights
proposal.pleaseEnterTheNumberOfCoAuthors: Please enter the number of co-authors
proposal.desiredLocationsInfo: In case you planned your project execution with a collection of participating institutions, you can list the institutions here.
proposal.typeOfUse_dataPrivacy: Privacy notices per type of use
proposal.typeOfUse_CENTRALIZED: Data is brought together and analyzed centrally
proposal.typeOfUse_CENTRALIZED_Info: Data is brought together and analyzed centrally
proposal.informationOnTheRequestedDataInfo: Please specify the requested data and entities in detail. You can make use of the FHIR-core (https://simplifier.net/organization/koordinationsstellemii/~projects) dataset or describe the data in clinical language. If possible try both.
proposal.patientInfo: Information on patient selection / inclusion criteria and exclusion criteria
proposal.pleaseEnterYourDetailsForPatientSelectio: Please enter your details for patient selection here
proposal.pleaseEnterYourDataSelectionInformationH: Please enter your data selection information here
proposal.thereIsAlreadyExistingProposalWithTheNam: There is already existing proposal with the name
proposal.participantsAreRequired: It is required to provide participants
proposal.checklistGenericError: It was not possible to save the checklist
proposal.isRegistrationLinkSentLabel: I have sent a registration link to the applicant and all participating scientists
proposal.isUniqueLabel: I have checked the project title and confirm the uniqueness of the project proposal
proposal.isAttachmentsCheckedLabel: I have checked the contents of all attachments and confirm their completeness
proposal.isCheckedLabel: I have reviewed the project proposal and have marked areas to be revised as a task for the applicant
proposal.uniquenessGivenDescription:
Please look manually or on the basis of the project proposals if there are already similar projects. 
Confirm the uniqueness of the project or request changes in the title or reject the project proposal with reasons.
proposal.checkedAreasDescription: Please review the application for content and completeness. Mark areas as reviewed. Leave tasks for the applicant and request revisions if necessary. If the application is found to be correct without objection you may forward it to the sites
proposal.noAttachmentsYet: The proposal does not contain any further attachments yet
proposal.noContractDraftsYet: The proposal does not contain any contract drafts yet
proposal.noContractsYet: The proposal does not contain any contracts yet
proposal.noEthicVotesYet: The proposal does not contain any attached ethic vote yet
proposal.yourApplicationIsStillInTheDraftProcess: Your application is still in the draft process
proposal.archiveProjectModalTitle: Do you really want to send the application back to the applicant for revision?
proposal.archiveProjectModalDescription: Your created tasks will be assigned to the applicant for revision. The application can only be forwarded to the sites by the FDPG staff after it has been resubmitted by the applicant.
proposal.requestRevisionModalTitle: Do you really want to send the application back to the applicant for revision?
proposal.requestRevisionModalDescription: Your created tasks will be assigned to the applicant for revision. The application can only be forwarded to the sites by the FDPG staff after it has been resubmitted by the applicant.
proposal.rejectRequestModalTitle: Do you really want to reject the application?
proposal.rejectRequestModalDescription: The application is displayed as rejected to the applicant. The requester has the option to archive the request or recreate it as a draft. Make sure you leave the requester a reason via the comment field before rejecting the request now. The process cannot be undone.
proposal.toContractingModalTitle: Do you really want to initiate contracting?
proposal.toContractingModalDescription: By initiating contracting, you are asking the researcher to enter into a contract with selected sites with his or her signature. Please ensure that the sites' requirements are included in the contract, that the researchers are aware of any conditions on the data and biospecimens requested, and that the contract is uploaded labeled with the latest version number.
proposal.toLocationCheckModalTitle: Do you really want to pass the application to all selected sites?
proposal.toLocationCheckModalDescription: The project application is forwarded to all selected sites. The application can no longer be processed by the applicant.
proposal.toExpectDataDeliveryModalTitle: Do you really want to conclude the contract?
proposal.toExpectDataDeliveryModalDescription: By closing the contract, the current phase of the project begins and the contract of all parties is considered closed. For sites that are not included in the contract closure, the project is considered finished. This action cannot be undone.
proposal.toReadyToArchiveModalTitle: Do you really want to finish the project?
proposal.toReadyToArchiveModalDescription: The project is released for archiving and declared finished.
proposal.declineToReadyToArchiveModalTitle: Do they really want to deny project completion?
proposal.declineToReadyToArchiveModalDescription: The scientist can then add more publications and reapply for project completion.
proposal.proposalTask: TODO from the Research Data Portal
proposal.rejectContractProposal: Do you really want to reject the contract proposal?
proposal.rejectContractProposalModalDescriptionRe: By rejecting a contract proposal, the project proposal is terminated. This action cannot be undone and must be justified.
proposal.acceptContractProposal: Do you really want to accept the contract proposal
proposal.acceptContractProposalModalDescription: To conclude a contract please follow the steps below. The conclusion of the contract can not be canceled.
proposal.downloadContractDescription: Please download the latest contract version and print it out twice
proposal.yourConditionWillBeCheckedByFdpg: Your conditions will be checked by the FDPG and, if necessary, integrated into the contract. If your condition is not taken into account, you will automatically receive a rejection when the contract is concluded
proposal.asADataProviderYouMustSpecifyAQuantity: As a data provider you have to specify a quantity
proposal.noLocationInCurrentState: Currently there is no location in this state.
proposal.youWillReceiveANotificationAsSoonAsYouCa: You will receive a notification as soon as you can upload the signed contract
proposal.pleaseSendUsTheSignaturePage: Please send one copy of the signature page of the contract to us by post
proposal.uploadSignitureDescription: Upload the contract again with your signature attached
proposal.noContractDraftYet: There is no contract draft yet
proposal.informationOnDesiredDataAmount: Information on the minimum amount of data required
proposal.biosampleTypePlaceholder: Type of the requested biosample, e.g. EDTA-plasma
proposal.attachmentsOnlyAfterSavingHint: Attachments could be uploaded after initial saving of the proposal.
proposal.acceptContractDescriptionResearcher: The Research Data Portal has sent you a contract proposal that provides for the participation of {numberOfApprovedLocations} sites. Approve the contract by uploading it with your signature or reject the contract proposal.
proposal.acceptContractDescriptionUac: The Research Data Portal has sent you a contract proposal. Agree to the contract, specify the number of patients you can deliver, and include any contract requirements. Once the applicant has signed the contract, you can countersign the contract.
proposal.acceptContractDizTodoDescription: With your OK you confirm that this request can be checked in your local UAC.
proposal.acceptContractDizModalDescription: With this step you confirm that you agree to forward the proposal to the UAC.
proposal.acceptContractDizDeclineModalDescription: By rejecting a research proposal you do not participate in the project. This action cannot be undone and must be justified.
proposal.locationSingTodoDescription: The Research Data Portal has sent you a contract proposal that provides for the participation of your site. Agree to the contract by uploading it with your signature or reject the contract proposal.
proposal.uacSignModalTitle: Do you really want to accept the contract proposal
proposal.uacSignModalDescription: To conclude a contract please follow the steps below. The conclusion of the contract can not be canceled.
proposal.uacApprovalTodoDescription: The Research Data Portal has sent you a project proposal. Agree to the proposal, specify the number of patients you can deliver, and include any contract requirements. Once the applicant has signed the contract, you can countersign the contract.
proposal.uacApprovalModalTitle: Do you really want to accept the contract proposal
proposal.uacApprovalModalDescription: To conclude a contract please follow the steps below. The conclusion of the contract can not be canceled.
proposal.uacApprovalDeclineModalTitle: Do you really want to reject the research proposal?
proposal.uacApprovalDeclineModalDescription: By rejecting a research proposal you do not participate in the project. This action cannot be undone and must be justified.
proposal.locationSignDeclineModalTitle: Do you really want to reject the contract proposal?
proposal.locationSignDeclineModalDescription: By rejecting a contract proposal you do not participate in the project. This action cannot be undone and must be justified.
proposal.noFeasibilityQueriesSaved: No feasibility requests could be found
proposal.noFeasibilityQueriesWhenError: No feasibility requests could be loaded
proposal.declineReasonPlaceholder: E.g. No data can be delivered because...
proposal.locationVoteExcludeReasonType_LOCATION_S: Rejected at the conclusion of the contract
proposal.lockModalDescription:
Please note that this will disable any function of the proposal.
The lock can be reversed at any time.
proposal.unlockModalDescription: Please note that this will reactivate all functions of the proposal.
proposal.lockModalTitle: Do you really want to lock the proposal?
proposal.unlockModalTitle: Do you really want to unlock the proposal?
proposal.deletePublicationModalDescription: Do you really want to delete publication?
proposal.deleteProposalModalDescription: Do you really want to delete proposal?
proposal.deleteReportModalDescription: Do you really want to delete the report?
proposal.reportUploadPlaceholder: The report doesn't have any attachment yet.
proposal.admitReputationOfAttachmentInformation: Every proposal must be accompanied by the ethics vote of the ethics committee responsible for you. If no ethics vote is required, you must enclose a declaration of non-responsibility from the ethics committee. Please make sure that the ethics application on which the vote is based fully covers the project you describe in the proposal. If you request additional data elements from the MII or have additional questions, you will need an amendment from the Ethics Committee to supplement the vote.
proposal.admitReputationOfAttachment: The attached ethics vote fully covers the use of the data and biospecimens described in the use research proposal.
proposal.plannedPublicationDescriptionInfo: Please briefly describe the intended content of the publication.
proposal.plannedPublicationAuthorsInfo: Please name all authors and co-authors already planned without obligation following the pattern: Max Mustermann, Jane Doe.

projectStatus.DRAFT: The proposal is still in draft status
projectStatus.REWORK: The proposal is rejected for revision
projectStatus.FDPG_CHECK_FOR_RESEARCHER: The proposal will now be reviewed by the Research Data Portal by {date}.
projectStatus.FDPG_CHECK_FOR_FDPG: You must review the proposal by {date}.
projectStatus.LOCATION_CHECK: The proposal will now be processed by the locations by {date}.
projectStatus.CONTRACTING: The contract for the project is in the process of being reconciled.
projectStatus.EXPECT_DATA_DELIVERY: The project data/results are being prepared for collection.
projectStatus.DATA_RESEARCH: The project is in the analysis phase.
projectStatus.DATA_CORRUPT: The project data/results are in review.
projectStatus.READY_TO_ARCHIVE: The project is ready to be archived.
projectStatus.LOC_DIZ_CHECK: The project proposal must be reviewed by your DIZ by {date}.
projectStatus.LOC_DIZ_APPROVED: The project proposal needs to be reviewed by your UAC by {date}.
projectStatus.LOC_UAC_APPROVED: The project proposal will be processed by other locations by {date}.
projectStatus.LOC_WAITING_FOR_RESEARCHER_SIGN: The contract proposal is reviewed by the scientist.
projectStatus.LOC_SIGNED_CONTRACT: The project proposal will be processed by other locations by {date}.
projectStatus.LOC_SIGNED_CONTRACT_AND_CONTRACTING_DONE: Your location must provide the project data/results by {date}.
Your location is participating in the project.
projectStatus.LOC_REQUESTED_BUT_EXCLUDED: Your location is not involved in the project.
projectStatus.LOC_NOT_REQUESTED: Your location is not involved in the project proposal.
projectStatus.LOC_CONDITIONAL_APPROVAL_DECLINED: Your contract requirements have been rejected. Your location is no longer involved in the project proposal.
projectStatus.LOC_RESEARCHER_REJECTED_CONTRACT_FOR_DIZ: The scientist has rejected the contract proposal.
projectStatus.LOC_RESEARCHER_REJECTED_CONTRACT_FOR_UAC: The project has not come to fruition.
projectStatus.LOC_RESEARCHER_ACCEPTED_CONTRACT: Your location must sign the contract by {date}.
projectStatus.LOC_CONDITIONAL_APPROVAL_ACCEPTED: The contract requirements have been accepted. The contract for the project is in the process of being finalized.
projectStatus.LOC_CONDITIONAL_APPROVAL_PENDING: The contract requirements are being reviewed.
projectStatus.PROJECT_IS_LOCKED: The Proposal is currently locked for editing
